Comment:
On load mission
STRM_ONLOAD_INTRO,The next day"
column6:
On load intro

STRM_13v01,Lieutenant Kukuschkin reporting for duty

English: American special forces. That's the reason I've called you here.
As you can see, we have few tanks and even fewer crew. You are needed at the front, immediately.
But sir I've just barely completed my basic training.
We don't have any other choice, comrade.\nYour platoon is waiting for you. Report to major Frolov.
Finally, lieutenant. Jump in your tank and let's go. Our units are in trouble!
BAZA TO YURI. INTEL REPORTS INCOMING TANKS FROM THE SOUTHERN ROAD. DEAL WITH THEM BEFORE YOU CONTINUE ON TO THE BASE. BAZA OUT.
WE ARE DONE HERE. MOVE ON TO THE BASE.
GOOD THAT YOU'RE HERE, YURI. ENEMY ARMOUR IS COMING FROM THE NORTH. HELP US REPEL THEM!
